attributes.action: Set up a national system to provide animal health certificates at a fixed cost
attributes.additional_details: This system should be set in place to provide a reasonable cost for an AHC to allow UK families an affordable means to travel abroad with their pets.
attributes.background: Provide a system to issue an AHC (Animal Health Certificate) for travel to Europe at a fixed price.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568802
